title: My node synchronization seems to be stuck, are the following logs part of the normal behavior?
body:
Geth & Prysm, Heres what I use:
```
geth --http --http.api eth,net,engine,admin --authrpc.jwtsecret /data1/.../prysm/jwt.hex --datadir /data1/.../data

./prysm.sh beacon-chain --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --jwt-secret=/data1/.../prysm/jwt.hex --datadir=/data1/../data2
```

EL side log:
```
INFO [08-25|10:20:16.745] Disabling direct-ancient mode            origin=15,537,228 ancient=14,811,135
INFO [08-25|10:20:17.390] Imported new block headers               count=0 elapsed=27.664ms    number=15,537,393 hash=55b11b..7bb286 age=11mo1w6d ignored=165
INFO [08-25|10:20:17.390] Legacy sync reached merge threshold      number=15,537,394 hash=b84f2d..b2e97c td=58,750,014,772,935,592,709,055 ttd=58,750,000,000,000,000,000,000
INFO [08-25|10:20:17.390] State heal in progress                   accounts=0@0.00B slots=0@0.00B codes=13114@97.85MiB nodes=16,612,781@1.62GiB pending=1
WARN [08-25|10:20:17.531] Unexpected trienode heal packet          peer=c8c6a429 reqid=4,232,769,439,825,997,197
INFO [08-25|10:20:21.276] Disabling direct-ancient mode            origin=15,537,228 ancient=14,811,135
INFO [08-25|10:20:21.922] Imported new block headers               count=0 elapsed=28.243ms    number=15,537,393 hash=55b11b..7bb286 age=11mo1w6d ignored=165
INFO [08-25|10:20:21.922] Legacy sync reached merge threshold      number=15,537,394 hash=b84f2d..b2e97c td=58,750,014,772,935,592,709,055 ttd=58,750,000,000,000,000,000,000
INFO [08-25|10:20:21.922] State heal in progress                   accounts=0@0.00B slots=0@0.00B codes=13114@97.85MiB nodes=16,612,781@1.62GiB pending=1
WARN [08-25|10:20:21.922] Local chain is post-merge, waiting for beacon client sync switch-over...
WARN [08-25|10:20:22.035] Unexpected trienode heal packet          peer=4dda176c reqid=5,903,752,655,894,578,277
INFO [08-25|10:20:25.816] Disabling direct-ancient mode            origin=15,537,228 ancient=14,811,135
INFO [08-25|10:20:26.460] Imported new block headers               count=0 elapsed=27.791ms    number=15,537,393 hash=55b11b..7bb286 age=11mo1w6d ignored=165
INFO [08-25|10:20:26.460] Legacy sync reached merge threshold      number=15,537,394 hash=b84f2d..b2e97c td=58,750,014,772,935,592,709,055 ttd=58,750,000,000,000,000,000,000
INFO [08-25|10:20:26.460] State heal in progress                   accounts=0@0.00B slots=0@0.00B codes=13114@97.85MiB nodes=16,612,781@1.62GiB pending=1
WARN [08-25|10:20:26.591] Unexpected trienode heal packet          peer=907d4e56 reqid=4,679,836,308,889,636,254
```
CL side log:
```
time="2023-08-25 10:20:24" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xa785e12b... 2496192/7175500 - estimated time remaining 81h44m56s" blocksPerSecond=15.9 peers=39 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:28" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xd139916c... 2496256/7175500 - estimated time remaining 81h44m52s" blocksPerSecond=15.9 peers=42 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:29" level=info msg="Ready for The Merge" latestDifficulty=17179869184 network=mainnet prefix=powchain terminalDifficulty=58750000000000000000000
time="2023-08-25 10:20:32" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xd4c9299b... 2496320/7175500 - estimated time remaining 81h29m25s" blocksPerSecond=15.9 peers=44 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:36" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xab38837b... 2496384/7175501 - estimated time remaining 81h14m4s" blocksPerSecond=16.0 peers=44 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:40" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xe52c8f2d... 2496448/7175501 - estimated time remaining 81h29m17s" blocksPerSecond=15.9 peers=43 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:45" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xc6205f62... 2496512/7175501 - estimated time remaining 81h44m36s" blocksPerSecond=15.9 peers=42 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:49" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0xd82691ce... 2496576/7175502 - estimated time remaining 82h15m34s" blocksPerSecond=15.8 peers=42 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:53" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x0fe1d803... 2496640/7175502 - estimated time remaining 82h15m30s" blocksPerSecond=15.8 peers=39 prefix=initial-sync
time="2023-08-25 10:20:53" level=info msg="Saved state in DB" prefix=state-gen root=c6205f623e69 slot=2496512
```

The first day of synchronization downloaded 500G+, the second day and the third day downloaded less than 10G in total, is there something wrong?
Yes I m not using checkpoint for some reason, Is there something wrong with my configuration and is there any other way to speed up the synchronization?

> remaining 82h15m30s"

Geth is currently positioned at the 'Merge' boundary, patiently awaiting the completion of the consensus client's synchronization process.

Since you choose to not use checkpoint sync, then you have to wait the full sync of consensus client. As reported, it's still very far away.
